snippet: The company is recalling 66,421 Touring and CVO Touring motorcycles from the 2014 model year because their front wheels can lock up without warning.
lead_paragraph: The company is recalling 66,421 Touring and CVO Touring motorcycles from the 2014 model year because their front wheels can lock up without warning.

headline.main: Harley-Davidson Issues Recall Over Brake-Line Problems
headline.print_headline: Harley-Davidson Issues Recall Over Brake-Line Problems
